front.title: PPP for Asynchronous PAD to Synchronous X.25 access

abstract.t: The PPP protocol allows data transfer thru asynchronous or synchronous connections. But the prevalent Public Switched Data Networks (PSDNs) support connections between asynchronous and synchronous protocols. This document defines extensions to the PPP protocol to support asynchronous PAD to synchronous X.25 protocols on PSDNs.
